__e: My son would be ashamed of me if I was a murderer.
Needless to say, I am ashamed of myself.
I have never been more ashamed of myself... or more proud of you.
I was ashamed of you then and remain so to this day.
And you know it, and you should be ashamed of yourself.
I hope you're half as ashamed of you as I am.
I love the way the two of you aren't embarrassed about where you are in life.
I know what it means... to be ashamed of what you did, of who you are.
Well, that means he's either embarrassed about the relationship or he doesn't care enough about his mother to tell her he's in one.
Uh, I think you've embarrassed yourself enough for one day.
Well, you embarrassed yourself way more than me. You know what?
The fact that you lost your mind and embarrassed yourself in front of everyone.
You don't think I know how embarrassed you are of me?
It's a good thing Walter was here, because Tom got home, he was so embarrassed, he didn't want to talk to me, he wanted to talk to another man.
I'm really ashamed that,you know,i'm not in the game any more, and i'm angry because i'm a fighter.
It's just that I feel so bad and so ashamed of everything I did before.
Alright, the thing is, he's embarrassed about having that kind of a relationship with somebody so much younger than him.
It was--you know, he was embarrassed about it, and I, you know-- well, why didn't he at least tell mom?
I'm sorry and embarrassed, and you have every right to be... I'm sorry and embarrassed, and you have every right to be...
But the point is, Dad, I'm really ashamed and sorry... and afraid.
I was embarrassed. And it wasn't your problem, and it still isn't.
